title: Emerging Technologies Changing the Facilities Management Landscape - CleanLink
summary: This article discusses the growing popularity of various technologies in facility management and cleaning, and how they are changing the industry for the better. New technologies such as autonomous cleaning equipment and UV technology are effective, affordable, and in high demand. Touchless technology continues to be the gold standard in restroom cleanliness. IoT technology is the integration of smart devices, sensors, and systems to improve efficiency, productivity, and cost-effectiveness. While there is growing interest in this technology, some software packages are still cost-prohibitive, but this is likely to change in the future.

title: Building Sustainability's Digital Future with EcoStruxure™ Resource Advisor Copilot: Schneider Electric's Latest AI ... - PR Newswire
summary: Schneider Electric has developed EcoStruxure Resource Advisor Copilot, a conversational AI tool that helps businesses interact with their enterprise energy and sustainability data. Copilot will provide enhanced data analysis, visualization, decision support, and performance optimization. The private beta will launch over the next month, and general availability of the solution will occur in late 2023 / early 2024.
green_innovation: TRUE, Copilot aims to enhance data analysis, visualization, decision support, and performance optimization related to energy management, automation, and sustainability which are all criteria of green innovation.

It uses Large Language Model technology to process industry knowledge and system information, providing enhanced decision support and performance optimization.

green_process: FALSE, Copilot is a software-based platform and is not a process itself.

title: Why Customers Leave Platforms — and How to Retain Them - HBR.org Daily
summary: Platform companies are constantly struggling to prevent their partners from taking their deals off-platform, with disintermediation killing once thriving businesses such as Borders, Blockbuster, and Tower Records.

title: Benefits of Using Digital Twins Across Industries - AiThority
summary: Digital twins are transforming industries by enabling real-time monitoring, predictive maintenance, optimization of resource management, and prototyping. They contribute to sustainability efforts by reducing waste, optimizing energy consumption, and minimizing environmental footprint. Companies across various sectors are leveraging digital twins to drive innovation, enhance operational efficiency, and gain a competitive edge.

title: RapDev Named Datadog Partner of the Year; Announces Launch of 4 New Products on Datadog Marketplace - PR Newswire
summary: RapDev, a leading DevOps engineering firm, has been awarded the 2023 Datadog Partner Network (DPN) North America Partner of the Year Award for the second consecutive year. In addition to the award, RapDev launched four new offerings on the Datadog marketplace. The new offerings include integrations with SwiftMQ, Spacelift, IBM Cloud, and Datadog Usage Tracker.
